name: Unused Styles Remover
description:
Remove any unused fonts, colors, effects and grids, from your style set.


You can mark, which of elements should be removed and they run the plugin, without re-setting, or select a category, via the context menu.


WARNING

Plugin can be slow on large documents with a lot of styles
